description:
Why Video Marketing is Required ?
  • Videos are Engaging.
  • Many people enjoy watching videos.
  • Video will increase your brand and credibility.

So, video advertising is playing a key-role in increasing the business exposure along with the profits.

Do you know these quick facts ?

  • Every Day 100 Million Internet Users Watch An Online Video
  • 75% Of Users Visit The Marketer's Website After Viewing A Video
  • 26% Of Internet Users Look For More Information After Viewing A Video Ad
  • After Visiting A Video Ad, 12% Of Viewers Purchase The Specific Product Featured In The Ad
  • Website Visitors Are 64% More Likely To Buy A Product On An Online Retail Site After Watching A Video

(Note: These are some of the important facts via QuickSprout, InSivia, and DigitalSherpa.)

With over 1 billion unique users visits & more than 6 billion hours of videos being watched monthly on YouTube, you now have a chance to take your business to the next level by advertising on YouTube.

YouTube advertising is one of the most underutilized channels and you can get very cheap clicks.

What can a Video Marketing (especially YouTube) do for your business ?

  • Increase in-store visits
  • Increase phone calls
  • Drive online sales
  • Drive online leads
  • Drive more traffic
  • Increase your brand presence

This course "Learn YouTube Ads Marketing & Video Advertising For Profits" provides you the basic knowledge to advertise on YouTube. It also provides you the various insights related to targeting and getting cheap clicks. So, what are you waiting for ?

Take this course and start advertising on YouTube.
title: Learn YouTube Ads Marketing & Video Advertising For Profits
